column5: Bike (maximum space available is 2 per train)""
column8:
We appreciate that some of our passengers will be headed for our great outdoors, so we’ll do our best to accommodate your extra gear, if the space is available. There will be an additional charge for carrying bicycles.
Because of space demands, bicycles will be limited to twor per train service and we recommend that you book your bike on in advance to secure a place. You may also be requested to remove, fold, or cover some parts of your bike. We will contact you if there is a problem with space and cannot confirm your bicycle.

""

column5: Surfboard (maximum space available is 2 per train)""
column8:
We appreciate that some of our passengers will be headed for our great outdoors, so we’ll do our best to accommodate your extra gear, if the space is available.
There will be an additional charge for carrying surfboards.
Because of space demands, surfboards will be limited to two per train service and we recommend that you book your surfboard on in advance to secure a place. We will contact you if there is a problem with space and cannot confirm your surfboard.

""

Discover spectacular Milford Sound and experience its unique scenery with a cruise around the fiord, a must-do experience for all travellers to New Zealand.

""

Guided tour through the famous Waitomo Glowworm Caves. See amazing stalagmites and stalactites, and take a magical boat ride through the Glowworm Grotto.

""

This is the original Waitomo subterranean adventure that will have you climbing, black water tubing, leaping, through Ruakuri Cave.

""

column5: Excess Baggage (up to 23kg, max 1 additional per guest)""
column8:
We appreciate that some of our passengers will be carrying extra luggage, so we’ll do our best to accommodate your extra gear, if the space is available.

""

column5: Hermitage Hotel Lunch - Mount Cook Day Tour:""
column8:
Add an enjoyable lunch (optional extra) to our Mount Cook Day Tour at the famous Hermitage Hotel in Mount Cook Village. After lunch you'll have time to explore the village and soak up the view. Alternatively there is time to experience a scenic helicopter or ski plane flight for incredible views of mountain peaks and glaciers (additional cost, weather permitting – this flight can be arranged with your driver guide on the day).

""

column5: Air Milford Scenic Flight - Milford Sound to Queenstown (1525 - 1945)""
column8:
Instead of catching the bus back to Queenstown after your day in Milford Sound, why not book a scenic flight option and wing your way back high over the mountains, lakes and rivers of the South Island. This flight is sold in conjuction with the Intercity or Great Sights day tours from Queenstown to Milford Sound.

\n

Depart Milford at 3.25pm, Arrive Queenstown 7.45pm

""
